data.name: Water Girls
data.detailed_description:
Water Girls is a fun visual novel that follows Jasmin as she has a day out with two female friends. What wild fun will they have together as you get to choose what water activity to enjoy, visit the beach or the water park either way could lead to some crazy fun and sexy shinanigans between the three girls as your choices determine what happens during the game in this fun and frivolous adventure.

Game Features:
- Three Character in swimsuits
- A fun story with multiple choices
- Alternate endings based on your decisions
- A series of amazing illustrations
- Yuri/Lesbian Storyline (LGBTQ+)

data.short_description: Visit a variety of water attractions with Jasmin, Celia and Brianna as they strive to have a day of fun together in this Fun yuri/lesbian LGBTQ+ visual novel game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

content_descriptors.notes: The game is a yuri/lesbian themed game that include characters shown naked and in skimpy revealing outfits. In addition sexual scenes are shown and described between consenting female characters of the game. Group adult scenes are also included within.
